trans-unit.source:
This is Part B of the survey.

In Part B the questions are classroom specific. If you teach more than one class of students included in this project, you will complete Part B separately for each classroom.

If you teach a single subject, please complete the questions that relate to other subjects to the best of your knowledge or consult with a colleague for those details only.

When you are ready to begin, select the “Next” button.

Thank you!
trans-unit.target:
This is Part B of the survey.

In Part B the questions are classroom specific. If you teach more than one class of students included in this project, you will complete Part B separately for each classroom.

If you teach a single subject, please complete the questions that relate to other subjects to the best of your knowledge or consult with a colleague for those details only.

When you are ready to begin, select the “Next” button.

Thank you!

trans-unit.source: How many classrooms do you teach that contain students participating in this research project?
trans-unit.target: How many classrooms do you teach that contain students participating in this research project?

trans-unit.source: Is there another adult who is paid to help you in this classroom (e.g., teaching assistant, co-lead teacher, etc.)?
trans-unit.target: Is there another adult who is paid to help you in this classroom (e.g., teaching assistant, co-lead teacher, etc.)?

trans-unit.source: How many students are enrolled in this classroom?
trans-unit.target: How many students are enrolled in this classroom?

trans-unit.source: How many children of each gender are in this class?
trans-unit.target: How many children of each gender are in this class?

trans-unit.source: As of today's date, how many children in this class are each of the following age levels?
trans-unit.target: As of today's date, how many children in this class are each of the following age levels?

trans-unit.source: Do you currently teach a multigrade class?
trans-unit.target: Do you currently teach a multigrade class?

trans-unit.source: If yes, what grade levels are included in the class you teach? (select all that apply)
trans-unit.target: If yes, what grade levels are included in the class you teach? (select all that apply)

trans-unit.source: What grade level do you teach?
trans-unit.target: What grade level do you teach?

trans-unit.source: What languages are spoken by students in this class (select all that apply)?
trans-unit.target: What languages are spoken by students in this class (select all that apply)?

trans-unit.source: What languages do you or your assistant teacher speak in the classroom (select all that apply)?
trans-unit.target: What languages do you or your assistant teacher speak in the classroom (select all that apply)?

trans-unit.source: About how many children in this classroom are BELOW grade level in their reading skills?
trans-unit.target: About how many children in this classroom are BELOW grade level in their reading skills?

trans-unit.source: About how many children in this classroom are ABOVE grade level in their reading skills?
trans-unit.target: About how many children in this classroom are ABOVE grade level in their reading skills?

trans-unit.source: About how many children in this classroom are BELOW grade level in their math skills?
trans-unit.target: About how many children in this classroom are BELOW grade level in their math skills?

trans-unit.source: About how many children in this classroom are ABOVE grade level in their math skills?
trans-unit.target: About how many children in this classroom are ABOVE grade level in their math skills?

trans-unit.source: How often each week do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Reading and Language Arts, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements ?
trans-unit.target: How often each week do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Reading and Language Arts, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements ?

trans-unit.source: How much time per day do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Reading and Language Arts, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?
trans-unit.target: How much time per day do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Reading and Language Arts, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?

trans-unit.source: How often each week do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Mathematics, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?
trans-unit.target: How often each week do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Mathematics, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?

trans-unit.source: How much time per day do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Mathematics, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?
trans-unit.target: How much time per day do children in this class usually work on lessons or projects in Mathematics, whether as a whole class, in small groups, or in individualized arrangements?

trans-unit.source: Think about the families of the children in this class who you have taught this school year. For about how many families are each of the following statements true?
trans-unit.target: Think about the families of the children in this class who you have taught this school year. For about how many families are each of the following statements true?

trans-unit.source: Families seem overwhelmed by trying to support their children's learning.
trans-unit.target: Families seem overwhelmed by trying to support their children's learning.

trans-unit.source: Families are doing their part to support children's learning.
trans-unit.target: Families are doing their part to support children's learning.

trans-unit.source: Please indicate how satisfied or dissatisfied you have been with the following this school year.
trans-unit.target: Please indicate how satisfied or dissatisfied you have been with the following this school year.

trans-unit.source: Communication between you and your students.
trans-unit.target: Communication between you and your students.
